title: An Explosive Email Surfaces (Ep 1698)
description:
In this episode I address the email that should change everything. Why isn’t the media talking about it? 

News Picks:


Hack website “NewsGuard” gets caught rating China propaganda sites higher than Newsmax.

Newly released State Department email blows the door off of the Trump/Ukraine hoax.

Another huge scandal at CNN.

The democrats are trying to wish their crime crisis away. 

Do not use GoFundMe, here’s why.
